title: Casa Nueva
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A worker-owned cooperative with nightly specials; seasonal menus feature local, organic, sustainable ingredients; most dishes can be made vegetarian; full bar features Ohio Draft Beer. Offer vegan dishes. Items are made to order and can cook   vegetarian or vegan dishes as requested.
